director.name: 维卡拉马迪亚·莫特文 Vikramaditya Motwane

introduction: Based on the graphic novel and animated series by legendary superhero creator Stan Lee (co-creator of Spider-Man, Iron Man, X-Men, The Avengers) comes his first Indian superhero, Chakra The Invincible. The theatrical live-action feature film will feature an older version of the character, Raju Rai as he creates a technology suit that unlocks the powers of the chakras, as he fights to save Mumbai and the world from the threat of Boss Yama.
